name: ARCHIMAESS OF THE ABYSS
desc:
The Archimaess commands shadows and voids.
Her power draws from the deepest darkness of the world.

name: QUEEN OF THE ANCIENT FOREST
desc:
A regal ruler of the mystical woods.
Her authority is absolute and revered.

name: DARK PALLADIN
desc:
A paladin turned to darkness.
Justice is his armor, vengeance his sword.

name: KING OF SHADOWS
desc:
The master of darkness.
His domain is fear and hidden terror.

name: MAESTRA OF SILENCE
desc:
A silent killer whose presence is barely felt.
Every move calculated to perfection.

name: ALCHEMICAL SUPREME
desc:
A supreme alchemist who bends reality with potions and spells.
Nothing can escape the crucible of her mind.

name: PRIMORDIAL ENT
desc:
A giant guardian of the forest.
Roots and branches defend against all intruders.

name: LICH-PATRIARCH
desc:
A powerful undead sorcerer.
Death obeys his command.

name: MECHANOLORD
desc:
Master of gears and engines.
His inventions crush all in their path.

name: PSYCHE THE CONSUMER
desc:
She devours memories and emotions.
Nothing can escape her psychic hunger.

name: SUPREME INQUISITOR
desc:
A relentless hunter of heretics.
His judgment is feared across the lands.

name: WAR LEADER
desc:
A master tactician and fierce warrior.
His strategies dominate the battlefield.

name: COMMANDER OF THE ORDER
desc:
A battle-hardened commander.
Every order is law, every move precise.

name: ETERNAL WANDERER
desc:
A wanderer who has seen ages pass.
His wisdom and power grow with every journey.

name: HIGH CHANGER
desc:
Master of disguise and transformation.
Her true form is a mystery even to herself.

name: BLOODY QUEEN OF JESTERS
desc:
A queen of illusions and mischief.
Her jokes bite like daggers and her laughter echoes in nightmares.

name: DARK SPIRITUALIST OF THE FOREST
desc:
Communes with corrupted spirits of the forest.
Nature bends to her dark will.

name: GHOST CAPTAIN
mission: Sail the seas of the dead!
desc:
A ghostly captain with spectral crew.
His ship sails where mortals fear to go.

name: SUPREME FORGE-MISTRESS OF THE DEPTHS
desc:
A supreme alchemist who bends reality with potions and spells.
Nothing can escape the crucible of her mind.

name: HIGH GRASSHOCKER OF THE DEPTHS
desc:
A creature from the deepest marshes.
Strong, swift, and merciless.
